channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2104] Pepsi To Cease Advertising
item.description: 'We Know It's Good, And That's Enough' Says CEO

item.title: [+2022] Reminder: Roman Polanski raped a child
item.description: Finally arrested 32 years after he fled sentencing for unlawful sex with a minor, the director is ... a big hero?

item.title: [+1675] Spain's Goth First Daughters (Pic)
item.description: Spanish Prime Minister José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero's daughters are totally goth. He thought he could hide them during this embarrassing (for him, anyway) phase, but thanks to a photo opp with President Obama and the First Lady, the secret is out.

item.title: [+1661] I Find Your Lack of Face... Disturbing
[+1643] If Video-Games Came With Warning Labels
[+1383] Digg does this ever work?
[+1253] Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's Gmail Inbox
item.description: With the nuclear scandal hitting the world press, we decided to take a peak into Iranian president, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad's Gmail inbox. And this is what we found.

item.title: [+1093] Obama Facebook Poll Asks "Should Obama Be Killed?" (PHOTOS)
item.description: A poll has been posted on Facebook asking users to vote "should Obama be killed?" The responses include: "yes," "maybe," "if he cuts my health care," and "no."See a screen shot of the poll below:

item.title: [+999] ACORN vs Blackwater
item.description: Rachel Maddow covers the hypocrisy in defunding ACORN while Blackwater and other defense contractors have committed much more serious crimes but continue receive hundreds of times as much money.

item.title: [+968] The Widowmaker [PHOTO]
item.description: 1.5 lbs of ground beef, 1 package of bacon, 1 package of italian sausage, 1 box of hot pockets, 1/2 package of fried onion strips between 2 Tombstone Pepperoni Pizzas topped with Velveta Cheese and Marinara Sauce.Yeah, that'd do it.

item.title: [+949] Bernie Madoff crushed by a farting bull.
[+925] Right-Wing Conference: Why Obama Is A Nazi
item.description: At the How To Take Back America Conference last weekend, conservative speaker Kitty Werthmann led a workshop called “How to recognize living under Nazis & Communists.” Announcing the panel in a column preceding the conference, talk show host Janet Porter gushed how Werthmann’s description of Austria in the 1930s is a “mirror to America” today

item.title: [+877] How the GOP Scares Grandma - With Lies
item.description: Once the party of fiscal sanity, the Republicans are now wailing that the Democrats’ health-care plan cheats seniors out of money. Matt Miller on the right’s shameless gambit.

item.title: [+710] "You wanna get that?" Hugh Jackman stops B'way show for cell
item.description: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Theatergoers won't forget to turn their cell phones off again, after Australian actor Hugh Jackman stopped a Broadway show to ask one audience member to stop a phone from ringing.

item.title: [+700] Mind Trip for your Eyes (PIC)
item.description: Once you see this, you may lose all track of time. Do not operate while driving heavy machinery!

item.title: [+593] Jon Stewart Rips Apart Tucker Carlson Yet Again
item.description: It doesn't matter what 24-hour news network you try to hide on Carlson, The Daily Show will find your smug, disingenuous, incurious, neck-tie-clad ass.

item.title: [+565] Hacking Big Mouth Billy Bass' Brain [Video]
item.description: Big Mouth Billy makes a roaring comeback from cultural obscurity with the help of MBED technology and some cool sound clips.

item.title: [+558] Remove Your Site From Google or I’ll Sue
[+531] What really happens when you die?
item.description: A new international study is endeavoring to apply hard science to one of life’s biggest mysteries — its end. “Most people think of death as a moment,” said the project’s founder, Dr. Sam Parnia. “We’ve found it goes on for a period of time.”

item.title: [+527] Whatever You Do, Don't Look Down... [PICS]
item.description: “Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall.” Salman Rushdie
